title: Chapter VIII - Requirements Relating To Education Aid
content:
Chapter VIII - Requirements Relating To Education Aid

State Regulations

Part 2385 - Education Law Requirements (ยง 2385.1 to 2385.3)

Part 2386 - Temporary School District Address Review, Validation And Correction Process For Identified School Districts And Limited Review For Receiver Districts (ยง 2386.1 to 2386.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
